AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Revian Expunged Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Revian priests inspect newborn children for infirmities, and those that were found weak are exposed to weather until they die. [PAWN_nameDef] was one such case, though [PAWN_pronoun] was rescued by other such exiles from a slow death.
